title: I am searching a ranked-team for Season 8 but im really NOT that good
body:
Well. uhm so im a main Toplaner but i enjoy Jungle as well. My main Champions at the moment are Riven and Graves but im flexible.
In Season 7 i was Silver 5 in flex que and i wanna improve that to Gold maybe. :) just ad me Ingame under: Cry me ª Riven . I am from Germany aswell but I speak English too and im 16 (male)
